attributes.action: Justify to us the tax payer why £400,000
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Justify to us the tax payer why £400,000 was spent on a Logo for the Olympics’. A child could have done far better. This display of the way in which the government waste our money must be open to us all for the reason for such a waste. Whilst funding for sport and Stonehenge has been cut or stopped.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
